typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CurrencyKey as string,
		CurrencyAlternateKey as string,
		CurrencyName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SrcDemo
SrcDemo sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false) ~> srcTgt
